ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( fpro__Service_Name__c = 'Field Actions', TEXT(fpro__Field_Action__c) = 'Field Edits', fpro__Description__c = null, fpro__Inline_Help_Text__c = null, fpro__Label_Add_Prefix__c = null, fpro__API_Name_Add_Prefix__c = null )
